movie_title: Thank you to everyone on YouTube!
introduction: I just wanted to say a quick thank you to everyone on YouTube for the amazing response you've given

vocabulary.definition: relating to society or social relations
vocabulary.example: The documentary explores the societal impacts of technological advancements.

vocabulary.definition: held in high regard; elevated in status
vocabulary.example: The artist's exalted status in the art world was well-deserved.

vocabulary.definition: free from outside control; not depending on another's authority
vocabulary.example: She runs an independent business that thrives on creativity and innovation.

vocabulary.definition: orders placed for products before they are officially available for sale
vocabulary.example: The company received thousands of pre-orders for the new smartphone model.

vocabulary.definition: the action of giving support, confidence, or hope to someone
vocabulary.example: His words of encouragement motivated her to pursue her dreams.

vocabulary.definition: not influenced or controlled by others in matters of opinion, conduct, etc.
vocabulary.example: The journalist prided herself on being an independent thinker with a unique perspective.
